content: WELCOME TO COUNT DOWN TO YOUR NEXT RANK v2. Check out v1 HEREImpotant Notice:-we all are free to post comments, but when posting a count down to your next rank, Make sure to read the rules carefully and follow them, doing otherwise will have your post deleted by me. And also note that this program is for those that have achieved the required Activity to move to the next rank, but are lacking in Merit(s), if your have achieved the Merit(s) required for your next rank and lacks enough Activity, receiving more Merit(s) through this program won't help you rank up immediately, but will in the long run though.IN MERIT- POST A COUNT DOWN TO YOUR NEXT RANK.Description:-This is announcing or posting -(and keeping post constantly updated)- the number of Merit(s) left to get you into your next rank.Benefits:-If you post the number of merit(s) left for you to move to the next rank here, Merit sources, Any one and Everyone watching this topic with lots of sMerit to share might decide to take a look at your post history, to find posts that are Merit worthy to Merit so as to help you ascend.Note:-Please note that you stand a better chance of being Assisted/Merited into your next rank if --you have little amount of Merit(s) left to ascend to your next rank.If your posts are of utmost quality.RULES1.To avoid or minimize spam, it is henceforth required that You must be a jr member rank and up to make a count down post on this thread - 1 merit is not so hard to earn on your own I believe.2.For orderliness, and to differentiate Count down Posts from ordinary comments, You are mandated to use the format below to make/create your count down post.Code:[b]My Countdown to _____ Rank[/b][b][i]Number of Merit(s) left: ?[/i][/b]3.It is mandatory that You must be less than 25 merits from next rank to make a count down post on this thread. 4.As you get Merit(s), Try as much as possible to keep your count down post updated with the current number(s) of Merit left to shift you to your next rank.5.You must have achieved enough activity level for the next rank before applying here, do not make a count down post if you are shot of activity for your next rank. 6.We know you would like your count down post to be on the first or last page of the thread for better visibility, but making a countdown post on every page is Spam and that's not so cool, So you are required to only ask (make a count down post) once in a 7 days period, and the limit is 3 posts for the same rank, any count down post made for the same rank after the 3rd one will be deleted. 7.After you have achieved your new rank, DO NOT USE THIS THREAD AS A PLACE TO ANNOUNCE YOUR NEW RANK, you can announce your new rank on Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!8.Failure to Adhere and comply with the above rules will result to a total boycott of your request, and your post stand a chance of being deleted for spamming. NEW RULE 9.Users with negative tags from DT for account farming/multiple accounts, scamming, loan default and other forum offences; is not allowed to make a post counting down to their next rank - doing so will increase your negative tag (negative tag from me) and as well, your post deleted.Rules are likely to be added or changed, but for now, make sure to read the rules above and obey them................GOODLUCK...............
